mapper.select: select * from sec_user where mobile = #{mobile} and state = 'U'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sec_user(user_id, username, passwd, mobile, create_date,expire_date,state) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{username}, #{passwd}, #{mobile}, #{create_date},#{expire_date}, #{state})
mapper.update: update sec_user set state = 'E' where mobile = #{mobile}
